name: Above the Fold
description: In this newspaper sim, you're the new Editor-in-Chief! Can you turn a small local newspaper into a well-respected media power house? Grow your staff of reporters, get subscribers, win awards and more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD FX-6300 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 640 Additional Notes: vsync support required
